item.description:
Let's try for one more summer fling. We're getting together at The Blue Oar in Haddam for good company and food!

The Blue Oar is a gem on the CT river. Great waterviews! Gourmets... bring your own tablecloth, wine, glasses and candles. you can't ask for more. Shame it can't last year round.

This is a BYOB event...so pack up a bottle of wine or a few bottles of beer and lets break bread together once more. Just remember, The Blue Oar does not accept CC...cash only!

The seafood is delicious...the desserts are awesome. So come and let's squeeze the last of summer out of this one.

If anyone is up for it later on in the evening...we can all go somewhere to do a little dancing. Have a favorite place? Share it with us!!! Hmmmm...I think someone is having a birthday that day!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup Sign...
item.name: Let's All Meet @ The Blue Oar...
